column3: Zacheus of the Gods' Quiver wants you to befriend the sylphs of Little Solace.

As a newcomer to Little Solace, Zacheus suggests that you make yourself known to the sylphs and show them that your intentions are friendly. Do as he bids and /dance before five sylphs in the settlement.
You have danced before the sylphs. Zacheus will be eager to hear how you fared.
Your enthusiastic gyrations have won you the trust of the sylphs of Little Solace. They will no longer hesitate to come to you with their troubles.
Your face is not known to me. New to Little Solace, I take it?
You would do well to make yourself known to the sylphs who dwell here─show them you come as a friend.

Were I you, I would seek out, say, five sylphs in the settlement, and <Color(-34022)>dance</Color> before them. Aye, you heard me right─<Color(-34022)>dance</Color>. That is their way of expressing goodwill, lest you wonder.
Endeared yourself to the sylphs, have you? You have a talent for dance, my friend. Heh heh!
Sylphs are a cheerful and friendly lot by nature, but since the trouble in their homeland, the few who abide here have grown wary of strangers.

It takes but a small gesture to break the ice, though. Alas, all too many prove unwilling to endure a moment's awkwardness for the greater good. It is well that you are an amenable sort. As a token of the sylphs' favor, they have given me this to pass to you.
What is walking one doing here? Unknown ones make these ones uncomfortable.
Ah, this walking one is a dancing one! Tee-hee-hee!
These ones are fond of all manner of merrymaking! Let these two make merry together!
What does unknown one mean to do? This one is frightened. Very, very frightened.
Walking one is not known here. Does walking one come with fell intent? This one knows not.
Ah! Walking one would be a friend to these ones! This one is overjoyed!
Some among these ones went and summoned a primal one. Those ones became hateful─hateful and mean to these ones. It makes this one very sad.
Walking one behaves strangely. Strange things are not to be trusted.
This one does not talk to unknown ones. Unknown one must first win this one's trust.
Oooh, walking one knows jolly dance! Jolly dance fills this one with good cheer! Let these two be friends!
Unknown one makes this one ill at ease. Go away! Shoo, shoo!
Who is this walking one? This one is busy listening to other walking one.
Walking one has sprightly steps! This one is amused! This one forgets other walking one! Tee-hee!
These ones are skilled at needlework. See those bulbous ones hanging from the trees? Houses made by these ones!
What does walking one want? This one focuses on talking with another one. Leave this one be.
This one is not fond of unfamiliar faces. What does walking one want?
Ah, walking one is a friend to these ones! Knows how to dance into these ones' hearts!
But this one refuses to be outdone! This one dances too!
Unknown one makes strange gesture. Unknown one can make strange gesture elsewhere.
